instructions: Before you begin setting up your Gear 3, you ll need to download and activate the Gear 3 app. If you re using a Samsung phone, you can download the Gear app from your Galaxy Apps . For non-Samsung Android devices, go to the Google Play Store to download Samsung Gear. Press and hold the Power button for a few seconds to turn the Gear on. The first time you power on your Gear 3, you re prompted to connect it to your smartphone. On your smartphone, select Apps > Samsung Gear. If you re prompted to update Samsung Gear, do that before you connect to your smartwatch. If there is no prompt, tap Start the Journey . On the Pick Your Gear screen, select your device. If the device isn t listed, tap Mine s not here. Then choose your device from the list that appears. Your smartphone will try to connect to your device. When the Bluetooth pairing request window is displayed on your Gear and your smartphone, take the checkmark on the Gear and OK on the smartphone to continue. Agree to the Terms of Service, displayed on your smartphone, and click Next. On your smartphone, you ll be prompted to set up your notifications and the apps you want to use on the smartwatch. When you ve made your selections tap Next to complete the setup and move to set up on your Gear 3. On your Gear 3, you ll be prompted to walk through a tutorial that shows you the basic controls of the device. Once you ve completed the tutorial, your setup is finished.

Press the Home key on the side of the device, your apps wheel should pen. Scroll through the apps wheel using the bezel of your phone or your finger until you find the Settings icon (looks like a gear). Tap the Settings icon. Select Style . Tap Watch faces . Scroll through the available faces to find one you like. When you find it, tap the face and it is activated. If there isn t a face that s appealing, you can install others by tapping the + Add Template button at the end of the list of available faces. This takes you to a list of additional faces you can install.

Press the Home key on the side of your device. Your apps wheel should open. Scroll through the apps wheel using the bezel of your phone or your finger. When you find an app you want to remove, press and hold the app for a second until a small minus sign appears on the icon. Tap the minus sign to remove the app. To add apps, scroll through the app wheel until you find a + (plus) icon. Tap the + icon. Scroll through the available apps to find the one you want to install. Tap the app and it is installed on your phone.
